desc: Wood By Taylor is a small local business located in Alberta CA. We make custom charcuterie & cutting boards, signs & home/office decor made from live edge solid wood ... made to last for generations! I use ecopoxy to fill cracks, knots & engravings - yes we ENGRAVE WITH A CNC machine. Functional art

layout.text:
🔥🔥🔥temporarily closed until July 15, 2022
All our orders are custom!

What happens when you combine live edge wood with ecopoxy and engraving
